wikipedia_page.main: Terry Morris (born 6 September 1965 in Llanelli) is a Welsh artist who is primarily known for his photography, particularly his association with the Cool Cymru arts movement.

link_mentions.page: List of painters by name beginning with "M"

response: Llanelli born photographer and artist Terry Morris was close to events and figures in the era, and as a result managed to document much of the decade. His book and exhibit was titled Cool Cymru, launched at the Wales Millennium Centre and opened by Charlotte Church. The series later became a three part television documentary by Llanelli-based Tinopolis.
